titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione,1,8-dihydroxy-4-[[4-(2-hydroxyethyl)phe yl]amino]-5-nitro-).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/10/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on a specified chemical.
